lastfm.summary: This song, "Baby Be Mine", is one of only two tracks on Thriller that weren’t released as singles with the other being the final track, "The Lady in My Life." Just like on Michael’s previous project, Off the Wall, Rod Temperton is credited as the songwriter for this track. At first, Michael didn’t appreciate the song, as he preferred another track written by Rod Temperton, "Hot Street." Quincy Jones, however, insisted that it be included on the album. Read more on Last.fm.
